scripts.minify: uglifyjs --screw-ie8 browser-polyfill.js ./dist/app.js > ./dist/app.min.js && uglifyjs --screw-ie8 ./js/utils/worker.js > ./js/utils/worker.min.js && uglifyjs --screw-ie8 array-from.js blob-util.js bluebird.js concat-stream.js id3js.js pouchdb-replication-stream.js pouchdb.js runtime.js > ./dist/worker-addons.min.js && uglifyjs --screw-ie8 serviceworker-cache-polyfill.js > serviceworker-cache-polyfill.min.js && uglifyjs --screw-ie8 worker.js > worker.min.js
scripts.deploy: npm run wipe_www && npm run copy_to_www && surge www
scripts.copy_to_www: mkdir www && cp -R CNAME dist favicon.ico fonts images index.html 200.html js opensearch.xml style.css worker.js serviceworker-cache-polyfill.js www
